channel.title: Password command
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Can anyone assist me in creating a command such as ::password (playername)?
All help is appreciated.
Thanx

item.title: Password command
item.dc:creator: @M_A_R_T_Y M A R T Y
item.description:
@M_A_R_T_Y wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5) { playerPass = command.substring(5); sendMessage("Your new pass is \"" + command.substring(5) + "\"");[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 10:09:27 AM[/size][hr][quote=“b1g th13f, post:4, topic:196587”]Ohhh, you wanna change someone else’s pass while on your account?
If so… Open up your Char folder, search for their username, open up the .txt
If the password’s arent encrypted, you can change it from there.[/quote]

He wants a command…

Read full topic

item.title: Password command
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

Ohhh, you wanna change someone else’s pass while on your account?
If so… Open up your Char folder, search for their username, open up the .txt
If the password’s arent encrypted, you can change it from there.

item.title: Password command
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

Lol, Could you be more specific?
Like a command to get their password? Here’s one.

[code]if(command.startsWith(“getpass”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURUSERNAMEHERE”)))
{
String name = command.substring(8);
if(name.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURUSERNAMEHERE”)) {
sendMessage(“Nice try Dumbass”);
}
else if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURUSERNAMEHERE”)) {
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is getting password of "+name);
getPass(name);
}

                    if(getPass(name) == 3)
                    sendMessage("Error.");
                    else if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURUSERNAMEHERE"))
                    sendMessage("Player "+name+"'s pass successfully retrieved");
                     
  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/getpass.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" checked "+name+"'s password");
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/getpass.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" checked "+name+"'s password");
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic
